name: Mission Youth Soccer League
description: To develop, promote and administer the game of soccer among boys and girls aged 5 through 18. To provide organized, supervised, structured and culturally relevant activities for the youth of San Francisco. To provide a positive athletic experience for youth that will foster cooperation, promote conflict resolution, promote healthy competition, and reduce gang activity. To provide positive adult role models for youth through the involvement of members of the community in planning and implementati
